data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea glauca (White spruce) from sample ARMSTPLA-61

Exposition N, Slope 35 deg, Geology: Blockschutt, av. Tree height 35 m, Tree cover 60%, Shrub cover 40%, Herb cover 25%, Moss cover 80%, Vegatation type: Steilhang Fichten-Wald auf Blockschutt, Film number: 797A
